DOC.brief_title: Benign Prostatic Hyperplasia Trial With Dutasteride And Tamsulosin Combination Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: A randomised , double-blind , parallel group study investigate efficacy safety treatment Dutasteride ( 0.5 mg ) Tamsulosin ( 0.4 mg ) , administer daily 4 year , alone combination , improvement symptom clinical outcome men moderate severe symptomatic benign prostatic hyperplasia .
